title: How To Be A World Champion Cigar Shop
itunes:title: How To Be A World Champion Cigar Shop
description:
Broadcasting LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire… The Cigar Smoking World Championship Event was supposed to be in New Hampshire this weekend,  But we are going to have our own championship today and we have 1,000 people joining us doing the same thing.  In the first hour we light up the Rocky Patel Cigar World Championship Cigar in its official competition size to see who will be the winner.

In the second hour we continue to smoke the cigar (hopefully), as we we talk about Retail Cigar Shops opening up again. Last week, we told you what consumers should be doing, this week we tell the retailers what needs to be done to become a World Champion Cigar Shop. We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
